trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Bristol
There were no other sightings in Bristol on or around July 24th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsorange yellow light star like object seen around clouds that were discharging, I was sitting at my neighbors fire pit talking there with them, there were some storms almost above me kinda back behind me a lil was looking at them and the stars and i saw a orange yellow light star like object near the clouds edge that was glowing from lightning with in the object was just there me looking up seeing the odd thing and it going was less then a min, more a few seconds , i took a double take on the object cause it alomost kinda look like a shooting star or a plane landing light it was bright as soon as i locked on it it shot off at say a 45'0 angle till it was no longer visible in to space . that was it kinda odd lately this is the 3rd object in like 2 months that was truely odd it was simmiler to the other report i posted infact i say it could have been the same object i reported near clouds a few weeks ago .
Summary: orange yellow light star like object
